application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Garages next to 1, Haydon Close, London
description: Details pursuant to condition 7 (Construction Method Statement), of variation of condition application reference 24/3288 dated 26/02/2025 for Variation of condition 3, development built in accordance with approved drawings and documents (alterations to include removal of steps and ramp to front entrance, bin store relocation, hardstanding, fenestration, lower undercroft, timber fence and increase pitched roof with two additional PV panels) of Full Planning Permission reference 23/2824 dated 30 January, 2024, for Erection of a two storey building to be used as two-bedroom dwellinghouse.
